revised_title: A Study of Boomerang Flight Mechanics
tldr: This article investigates the flight mechanics of boomerangs, focusing on their aerodynamics and the factors that influence their curved path. The author explains the role of the "rounding" and "twisting" in boomerang design and describes the flight path, which involves a loop and a gradual descent. The article provides a mathematical analysis of the forces acting on the boomerang during its flight, considering the air resistance and the boomerang's shape.
